Alinex is a [[Portugal|Portuguese]] [[operating system]]. It started with as an initiative between the regional government of [[Extremadura]] ([[Spain]]) and the [[University of Ãvora]] (a Portuguese university), in 2005<ref>http://www.alinex.org/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=46&Itemid=57</ref>. Version 1.0 was initially based on [[gnuLinEx]], but since version 2.0 it is based on [[Ubuntu]]. It is currently being developed by the University of Ãvora. It was included in computers provided by the Portuguese government and was also available in many Portuguese schools.
